patterns_discovered: CLI tool and installation instructions for each service
Detailed free tier and version information
Shell script for developer environment setup
gotchas_discovered: Multiple services with overlapping functionalities (Supabase vs Nhost)
Potential complexity in managing multiple CLIs and tools
Free tier limitations across different services
recommendations: Maintain this documentation as a living document
Regularly update service versions and features
Consider creating a simplified onboarding guide
Document migration paths between similar services
